The federal eviction moratorium has expired. Millions of Americans are now at risk of losing the roof over their head. My heart aches for all those facing uncertainty right now. Congress must move immediately to protect renters. Let’s start with my RELIEF Act to stop evictions.

The extra $600 in weekly unemployment benefits has been a lifeline for so many out-of-work Americans during this crisis. It's helped pay rent, cover mortgage payments, and put food on the table. We can't let it expire until our economy starts to recover.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/21/business/economy/coronavirus-unemployment-benefits.html
